entities: United Nations Office for West Africa
summary:
Acknowledges the significant contribution of women in conflict prevention, peacebuilding, and mediation efforts, and calls upon actors to increase women's involvement.

 Requests the Secretary-General to report on the situation in Mali by 31 July 2012.

 Requests the Secretary-General to develop and implement a United Nations integrated strategy for the Sahel region.

 Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
